title: Drones and aircraft parts
strapline: Get help to classify drones and aircraft parts for import and export

title: Ceramics
strapline: Get help to classify ceramic articles for import and export

title: Computers and software
strapline: Get help classifying computers, inkjet and toner cartridges and their components

title: Electric lamps
strapline: Get help to classify electric lamps for import and export

title: Footwear
strapline: Get help to classify footwear and parts of footwear for import and export

title: Herbal medicines, supplements and tonics
strapline: Get help to classify herbal medicines, vitamins, food preparations, supplements and tonics for import and export

title: Iron and steel
strapline: Get help to classify various items of iron and steel, primarily those classified under chapter 72

title: Leather
strapline: Get help to classify articles of leather and other items in chapter 42 of the tariff for import and export

title: Organic chemicals
strapline: Get help to classify organic chemicals that contain certain permitted additives or can be dissolved in water, for import and export

title: Plastics
strapline: Get help to classify plastics for import and export

title: Rice
strapline: Get help to classify rice and related products for direct human consumption for import and export

title: Textile apparel
strapline: Get help to classify textiles and which headings and codes to use

title: Tobacco
strapline: Get help to classify cigarettes, cigars, raw tobacco, smoking tobacco, tobacco for heating and nicotine substitutes for import and export

title: Wood
strapline: Get help to classify various types of wood for import and export

title: Edible fruit, vegetables and nuts
strapline: Get help to classify edible vegetables, roots, tubers, herbs, spices, fruit, nuts and peel for import and export

title: Electrical equipment
strapline: Get help to classify electrical equipment such as communication equipment, cameras, and their parts and accessories

title: Pharmaceutical products and placebos
strapline: Get help to classify pharmaceutical products used to treat or prevent diseases or ailments (in humans or animals), including comparators used in clinical trials and placebos

title: Toys, games and festive articles
strapline: Get help to classify various toys, games and festive articles for import and export

title: Vehicles, bicycles, parts and accessories
strapline: Get help to classify various types of vehicles such as mobility scooters, dumpers and utility vehicles, all-terrain vehicles and E-Bikes for import and export
